About

I am a Master in City Planning from MIT and an Architect from Universidad of Los Andes with fieldwork experience in Colombia, Brazil, Mexico and Kenya. I am an expert in master plan development, large-scale affordable housing projects, transportation model analysis, research design, big data analysis and new technology implementation for public policy decision-making processes. You can reach me through one of the contacts below or Download my CV
